original: Mosourika Tudor supposedly begged Stefanic Dracogen to hire Justin Waye. She wanted Justin to "turn his life around". Supposedly, he used to spend a lot of time with some "local delinquents". But has turned his life around since then.
translation: 莫苏里卡·都铎央求斯蒂芬尼克·德拉科根雇佣贾斯汀·维耶。她希望贾斯汀能“重回正轨”。贾斯汀以前经常和“当地流氓”混在一起，但现在已经改过自新。
